body_html:
When should it be freed? In principle, if the contiguous one is not saved, it should immediately be released after the grid_sample function, correct?

import torch
x = torch.cuda.FloatTensor(1, 1, 16384, 16384)
x = torch.autograd.Variable(x, requires_grad=True)
y = x.expand(2, x.size(1), x.size(2), x.size(3))
grid = torch.rand(2, 1, 1, 2)
import torch.nn.functional as F
z = F.grid_sample(y, torch.autograd.Variable(grid.cuda()))

After running the last line, the memory is tripled. Is that as expected?
